definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: The structure of vector was identified by endonuclease analyzing and base sequencing.
sentences.chinese: 通过核酸内切酶酶切分析及测序鉴定载体结构。

sentences.english: Genome library methodology was adopted for cloning of endoglucanase encoding genes.
sentences.chinese: 内切葡聚糖酶基因的克隆采取基因文库方法。

sentences.english: He ran square from the left before flicking the ball through at a right angle.
sentences.chinese: 他从左路内切，然后轻弹皮球精准地挑射入网。

sentences.english: Kallikrein is a kind of endopeptidase.
sentences.chinese: 激肽释放酶是一种内切蛋白酶。

sentences.english: Finally, we could evaluate plasmids cDNA extracted with mono-restriction endonuclease enzyme and the agar gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 最后用限制性内切酶单酶切及琼脂凝胶电泳进行鉴定。

sentences.english: After a restriction endonuclease cleavage, two expected smaller fragments were observed.
sentences.chinese: 经限制性内切酶反应，获得两个预期大小的片段。

sentences.english: Restriction enzyme site analysis was used to confirm the mutation.
sentences.chinese: 突变位点经限制性内切酶分析证实。

definition: to set up a teammate (with an opportunity to score)/to throw a game
to knock on the door/to take a shot on goal (sports)
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
to receive a served ball (volleyball, tennis etc)/to catch a ball thrown by sb
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
